job_tasks.phrase: scale our system to support millions of products per customer
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to building and maintaining infrastructure capable of handling large volumes of data, which is a core aspect of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: load test, identify bottlenecks, and deploy optimizations
job_tasks.justification: These actions are fundamental to performance tuning and optimization of data systems, falling under data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop, maintain, and scale our product catalogs backend
job_tasks.justification: Developing and maintaining backend systems is a core software development responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to the development of features to make our product easier to use
job_tasks.justification: This involves building user-facing functionalities, which is a primary software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Produce robust and sustainable code and demonstrate proficiency in debugging systems beyond your immediate responsibilities.
job_tasks.justification: Writing high-quality, maintainable code and debugging are essential software development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Uphold high-quality standards within the team.
job_tasks.justification: Maintaining quality standards in code and development practices is a key aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Leveraging AI and LLMs to make our products more appealing to users
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions the use of AI and LLMs for product enhancement, indicating a modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: enhancing product image backgrounds with GenAI
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct application of generative AI for a specific task, fitting within the 'Modeling' category.

soft_skills.phrase: demonstrate proficiency in debugging systems beyond your immediate responsibilities.
Uphold high-quality standards within the team.

classification.rationale: The role involves leveraging AI and LLMs for product enhancement, specifically mentioning 'GenAI' for image backgrounds. While there's a strong emphasis on backend software development and data engineering, the explicit mention of generative AI applications leans it towards a GenAI Engineer profile, albeit with a significant software engineering component.
